entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.7°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -40.6°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
